profile.name: Aghogho Meyoron
profile.biography: Hi, I'm Aghogho Meyoron, a seasoned full-stack software engineer specializing in crafting and overseeing web applications. With a proven history of bringing projects to life, I handle everything from inception to planning, wireframing, user experience (UX) design, coding, SEO, optimizations, and ongoing maintenance. My work embodies modernity and adheres to industry standards, featuring rigorous unit and feature testing and efficient coding to guarantee a flawless user experience. My ultimate aim is to deliver a seamless and efficient user journey for my clients.

notes.tagline: Building the future, one line at a time...
notes.about: Innovative Software Engineer with a passion for building scalable, user-centric solutions. Experienced in full-stack development, I specialize in crafting robust web applications and intuitive user interfaces. I thrive in collaborative environments, leveraging technology to solve complex real-world problems and drive impactful results.

item.name: Glover
item.description: As a Senior Backend Engineer at Glover, a leading Nigerian Fintech, I played a pivotal role in optimizing and securing the platform which offers services ranging from gift card trading to crypto payments. I led the migration of the legacy codebase from Laravel v7 to v12 with zero downtime, significantly boosting system performance and maintainability. My work focused on high-impact features including a custom login security system with anomaly detection, a high-speed rewards distribution engine, and a Google OCR-powered gift card validation system utilizing encryption for data security. I also architected a comprehensive Brand Ambassador dashboard and a fraud-resistant customer reward system, directly contributing to increased user engagement and platform trust.

item.name: Learnbits
item.description: Master the tech skills that matter, one byte at a time. Learnbits reimagines professional development with bite-sized, high-impact lessons designed for the busy modern developer. From React patterns to System Design, simply drop in, learn, and level up.

features.item: Micro-Learning Architecture: Dense, focused modules for maximum retention.
Open Knowledge Graph: Completely free access to high-value technical curriculum.
Progressive Complexity: Structured paths that grow with your skill level.
Developer API: A headless learning engine built to power external tools.

item.name: ContentForge
item.description: Your personal AI creative studio. ContentForge isn't just a wrapper—it's a sophisticated content engine that harnesses the power of Gemini to generate professional-grade articles, LinkedIn posts, and essays. Built for creators who refuse to compromise on quality or speed.

features.item: Multi-Modal Generation: Articles, posts, essays, and stories from a single dashboard.
Tone & Style Control: Fine-tune the AI to match your specific voice.
Privacy-First Design: Bring your own API key for complete data control.
Instant Export: Seamlessly move from draft to published content.

item.name: LearnFlow AI
item.description: The end of one-size-fits-all education. LearnFlow AI builds bespoke curriculums solely for you. By analyzing your goals and preferred learning style, it constructs a unique educational roadmap in seconds, turning "I want to learn" into "I am learning".

features.item: Adaptive Curriculum Engine: Generates courses tailored to your specific gaps.
Style-Matched Content: Explanations that resonate with how you actually think.
Instant Roadmap Generation: Go from curiosity to structured learning in seconds.
Dynamic Progress Tracking: Visualize your journey through complex topics.

item.name: LexAI
item.description: Legal intelligence, democratized. LexAI bridges the gap between complex legal jargon and everyday understanding. Using advanced natural language processing, it provides instant, accessible clarity on legal topics, empowering users to navigate the law with confidence.

features.item: Instant Legal Clarity: Translates statutes into plain English.
Context-Aware Analysis: Understands the nuance of your specific inquiry.
Broad Jurisdiction Support: Covers a wide range of legal topics and territories.
Safe-Guard Architecture: Engineered with strict disclaimers and safety rails.

item.name: PrepAI
item.description: The unfair advantage for your exams. PrepAI transforms study time into high-yield preparation. Whether tackling WAEC, JAMB, or GCE, our AI tutor identifies your weak points and drills you until they become strengths.

item.name: QuizWise
item.description: A quiz platform that never runs out of questions. Powered by real-time generative AI, QuizWise creates unique, challenging trivia on the fly. It's not just a game—it's a dynamic test of knowledge that evolves with every round.

item.name: Fun Arcade
item.description: Digital nostalgia, refined. Fun Arcade brings the golden age of gaming to the modern web. Built with a focus on pure performance and offline capability, it delivers distraction-free entertainment that loads in milliseconds and plays anywhere.

features.item: Zero-Latency Performance: Optimized for instant play.
Offline-First Architecture: Play without an internet connection.
Classic Game Collection: Faithful recreations of retro hits.
Cross-Device Sync: Seamless experience across mobile and desktop.

item.name: ResumeReady
item.description: Stop wrestling with formatting and start applying. ResumeReady combines professional design principles with AI-powered content optimization to help you build a winning resume. Stand out from the stack with documents that are ATS-friendly and visually striking.

features.item: AI Content Enhancer: Suggests stronger action verbs and metrics.
ATS-Optimized Templates: Designed to pass automated screening tools.
Real-Time Preview: See your changes instantly as you type.
One-Click Export: Generate polished PDFs in seconds.

item.name: ShellBase
item.description: The developer's command center. ShellBase transforms the chaotic world of CLI commands into a structured, searchable knowledge base. Stop Googling syntax and start executing commands with confidence using this high-performance reference tool.

item.name: iJokes
item.description: A showcase of seamless API integration and multi-platform deployment. iJokes isn't just a humor app—it's a demonstration of modern frontend architecture, featuring a responsive web app and a fully synchronized Telegram bot, all powered by a unified backend.

item.name: CalcPlay
item.description: Data Science meets satire. CalcPlay takes mundane numbers and spins them into unexpected, humorous, and sometimes shocking perspectives. It’s a playground for curiosity that challenges how we perceive scale, time, and probability.

item.name: Who wants to be a millionaire
item.description: The classic game show, reinvented with an AI brain. This isn't a static script—it's a dynamic experience where the 'Host' is powered by advanced AI, generating questions and commentary in real-time. Test your knowledge against a machine that knows how to challenge you.

features.item: AI Host Persona: Dynamic commentary and interaction.
Procedural Question Generation: Never see the same game twice.
Authentic Game Mechanics: Lifelines, timers, and climbing the ladder.
Immersive Audio-Visuals: High-fidelity recreation of the show's atmosphere.

item.name: Tovia Amadi | Digital Marketer
item.description: A dynamic portfolio for a Digital & Email Marketer. Features a custom AI chatbot "TovysAI", showcases his marketing campaigns, design projects, and product management skills.

item.name: Esther Idara Ubeng | Senior Product Manager
item.description: A professional portfolio for a visionary Senior Product Manager and Scrum Master. The site highlights her extensive experience in driving impactful product strategies, leading agile teams, and her dedication to mentoring aspiring tech professionals.

item.name: Enuma Ifeoma | HSE Personnel
item.description: A professional portfolio for a dedicated HSE Personnel. The site showcases her commitment to health, safety, and environment standards, featuring her certifications, projects, and professional journey.

item.name: Fortune Odjeni | Legal Practitioner
item.description: A comprehensive portfolio for a Lawyer in the making, Humanitarian Advocate, and Writer. Highlights his legal journey, advocacy work, and collection of written articles.

item.name: SalesHouse
item.description: Buy and sell pre-loved goods, connect with others, and find your next treasure.

features.item: in-app chat between sellers and buyers

item.name: DockYard
item.description: A privacy-first desktop workspace for all your web apps. It serves as an open-source alternative to Rambox, offering session isolation, auto-hibernation, and full customization to streamline your workflow.

features.item: Session Isolation: Keep your accounts separate and secure.
Auto-Hibernation: Save memory by suspending inactive apps.
Full Customization: Tailor the workspace to your needs.
Multiple Profiles: Manage different sets of apps easily.
Tab Tiling & Layout Control: Organize your workspace efficiently.

item.name: mayr_dart_extensions
item.description: A comprehensive set of handy Dart extensions to make your code cleaner, shorter, and more expressive. It provides utility methods for Strings, Numbers, Dates, Collections, and more.

features.item: Number extensions for formatting and calculations.
Collection extensions (List, Map, Set) for easier manipulation.

item.name: mayr_fake_api
item.description: A pure Dart package that intercepts API calls and returns fake JSON responses from local files during development. It streamlines development by simulating backend responses without needing a live server.

features.item: Intercepts network requests and serves data from local JSON files.
Works with both pure Dart and Flutter applications.
Supports multiple HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).
Dynamic data support with Faker-powered placeholders.

item.name: mayr_stateman
item.description: A lightweight and intuitive state utility for Dart. Easily manage and track states, statuses, messages, and payloads with simple, chainable methods.

features.item: Simple & Lightweight: Pure Dart state management with zero dependencies.
Comprehensive Status Management: Handle idle, loading, success, error, etc.
Fluent API: Chain multiple state updates elegantly.
Visual Feedback: Emoji representations for each status.

item.name: mayr_i18n_generation
item.description: Provides automatic type-safe translation key generation for projects using mayr_i18n. It scans JSON language files and generates structured Dart classes.

features.item: Scans JSON language files to generate Dart classes.
Provides code completion for translation keys.

item.name: mayr_i18n
item.description: A Dart-based, JSON-powered internationalization (i18n) library. It allows managing translations in plain JSON files and provides CLI tools for verification and syncing.

features.item: CLI tools for key verification, syncing, and auditing.
Dynamic string translation with variable interpolation.
Helper extension `.tr()` for easy translation lookup.
Supports nested keys and multiple languages.

item.name: mayr_validator
item.description: A powerful yet elegant validation library for Dart and Flutter, inspired by Laravel validator syntax and philosophy.

features.item: Fluent API for chaining validation rules.
Reusable validator groups for complex patterns.
Global configuration for defaults and messages.

item.name: mayr_storage
item.description: Simple and unified storage solution for Flutter apps. Easily manage SharedPreferences, EncryptedSharedPreferences, and GetStorage with a clean, consistent API.

features.item: Unified API for SharedPreferences, EncryptedSharedPreferences, and GetStorage.
Supports multiple data types (String, int, bool, List, etc.).

item.name: mayr_md_cms
item.description: A flexible Flutter widget that fetches and renders Markdown content from local assets, network URLs, or custom sources with built-in loading and error handling.

features.item: Fetch and render Markdown from assets, URLs, or custom sources.
Automatic handling of links (browser, clipboard, custom actions).
Fully customizable loading and error widgets.

item.name: mayr_flutter_extensions
item.description: A comprehensive set of handy Flutter-specific extensions to make your Flutter code cleaner, shorter, and more expressive. Designed to work alongside mayr_dart_extensions.

features.item: BuildContext extensions for simplified access to theme, media query, etc.
Widget extensions for padding, alignment, and more.
Reduces boilerplate code in UI development.

item.name: PruneJS
item.description: A powerful, configurable CLI tool designed to enhance the cleanliness and maintainability of JavaScript and TypeScript projects by identifying and removing unused code (dead code).

features.item: Smart scanning for unused exports and non-exported declarations.
Safe automatic removal of unused code using syntax-aware analysis.
Safety checks to prevent scanning excluded directories like node_modules.
Generates comprehensive Markdown reports on codebase health.

item.name: @youngmayor/base64
item.description: A lightweight and efficient utility package for Base64 encoding and decoding operations.

item.name: SecureFlow CLI
item.description: A CLI application for encrypting and decrypting sensitive files (like Flutter private assets) for secure CI/CD pipelines. It uses AES-256-CBC encryption to keep secrets safe.

item.name: EnvDoc
item.description: A powerful CLI tool for managing, validating, and transforming environment variable files (`.env`). It helps keep environment configurations in sync and documented.

features.item: Documentation Generation: Create example files and schemas from .env.
Auditing: Find duplicate keys and missing variables.
Synchronization: Keep .env files in sync across environments.

item.name: Innovative thinker
item.description: I leverage my innovative thinking to dismantle conventional approaches and build entirely new frameworks. My approach involves connecting seemingly disparate ideas and applying lateral thinking to create solutions that others haven't even conceived.

item.name: Technical Writer
item.description: I transform complex information into clear, concise, and engaging documentation that empowers users and drives product adoption. My focus is on understanding the audience and tailoring content to their specific needs, ensuring clarity and usability above all else.

item.name: Application Security
item.description: Knowledgeable in secure coding practices and vulnerability mitigation techniques. Familiar with common security threats and methods to protect software from attacks.

item.name: Database Designer
item.description: As a Database Designer, I sculpt robust and efficient data architectures that empower applications to thrive. My approach involves a meticulous understanding of data relationships, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance to unlock actionable insights.

item.name: Problem solver
item.description: I thrive on dissecting complex issues, rapidly identifying root causes, and developing pragmatic, effective solutions. My approach involves a blend of analytical thinking and creative problem-solving, consistently delivering results that exceed expectations and drive tangible improvements.

item.name: Web Engineer
item.description: As a Web Engineer, I architect and implement scalable web applications, translating complex requirements into clean, efficient, and maintainable code. My focus is on delivering user-centric solutions that drive tangible business results through optimized performance and seamless integration.
Glover is a digital marketplace enabling users to trade gift cards, airtime, and digital assets.

duties.item: Developed a security log system to monitor and audit user activities.
Implemented an OCR-powered system to detect and prevent duplicate gift card sales.
Built an integration layer with Freshdesk to manage user complaints via ticketing, improving user retention and customer support resolution times.
Contributed to the development of an automated airtime-to-cash conversion platform.
Enhanced the security and performance of the Giftcard system.
Built and maintained multiple promotional systems, including: Ambassador programme, Customer rewards, Referral system, Marketing promo engine, Spin-the-wheel game, and Voucher issuance.
Helped build an in-house reward currency tied to user milestones and engagement.
Optimised and upgraded the bill payment infrastructure for better reliability.
Worked on implementing cross-country KYC processes to support international user onboarding.
Contributed to authentication upgrades and platform-wide security improvements.

item.description: Patricia is a Nigerian cryptocurrency and digital asset company known for enabling users to buy, sell, and store digital currencies securely.

duties.item: Optimised existing infrastructure and improved backend performance.
Refactored and enhanced legacy codebase for better maintainability and scalability.
Contributed to the development of an internal admin dashboard for operational efficiency.

item.description: An Information Technology company with a goal of providing top notch internet solutions to companies globally

duties.item: Developed a total of two 2 web solutions to client companies in my one month contract period
Worked remotely with 2 existing staffs to optimize 2 existing web based projects using the company's in-house framework

item.description: Mayor Technology is a web based information technology company specialized in transforming in-house project idea to web and mobile applications.

duties.item: Established a team of 5 skilled developers
Built the company's internal use dashboard

Solely developed in-house projects for the company which includes a developer community platform, blog applications, video download sites, church advertorials and event management applications, e-commerce application and Job Agencies
Partnered in over 17 web based projects as contract developers

item.description: Flyte iSystems is a web based information technology company situate in Benin City of Edo State, Nigeria.

duties.item: Gained 2 years of experience in building backend solutions
Developed a total of 4 prototype apps which lead to 2 projects to the company
Developed from scratch a web platform for fund management as a lead developer in a team of 2 developers
Wrote and maintained interfaces with 3rd party providers including payment gateways, job agencies and news platforms
More than 5 custom apps created for clients
Developed websites for blogs, job agency, e-commerce, social media as well as in-house projects using Core PHP and MySQL with Ajax
Attained certificate of Grand Team Player by working ceaselessly and peacefully with a team of 14 developers in fields of Web Development and Mobile App Development
Worked in a team of 2 to build the Staff Management Console, Company Academy Student Tracking Panel, and Staff Task Allocation Panel of the company

achievements.item: Introduction to programming in C++: Building command line apps and terminal games using C++ as a means of skill development
General problem solving using Python: Created algorithms to render help in fields spanning across Science and Day to Day living
HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript: Using HTML to build static and beautified web pages
Backend Web Development with PHP and MySQL: Employed the use of PHP and MySQL in cooperation with previously attained Skills to develop Dynamic Web Pages
jQuery, XML, JSON, Ajax: Made use of Ajax Technologies to develop Web Solutions as a Backend Web Developer working collaboratively with a Co-Staff handling Frontend and UIX Designs
MySQL and Database Administration: I functioned as the Database Administrator
Server Administrator: I was put in charge of the server on which our projects where hosted, and also the general server on which the firm projects were hosted
Bootstrap: Advanced to building beautiful web pages/sites using the Bootstrap
PHP 7: Learnt effectively on the New APIs and functionalities offered by PHP 7 in building more secure and well optimized complex web programs
Wordpress: Familiarized myself with building E-Commerce, Landing Page Apps and Blog Webapps using Wordpress for speed and efficiency
VueJS: Made effective and proficient use of VueJS, a Javascript Framework, in building well optimized web applications at the front end
Modern Web Design: Adopted the use of modern technologies for building robust and highly scalable and slick web applications using NuxtJS, Vuetify, VueSax

item.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

item.title: Code Reviews
item.description: Get detailed feedback on your code, learn best practices, and improve your coding skills.

item.title: Technical Guidance
item.description: Navigate complex technical challenges with expert advice and practical solutions.

item.title: Career Development
item.description: Get advice on career paths, job searching, interviews, and professional growth.

item.title: Learning Resources
item.description: Access curated learning materials, tutorials, and resources tailored to your goals.

item.title: Networking
item.description: Connect with other professionals and expand your network in the tech community.

item.title: Regular Check-ins
item.description: Stay accountable with regular sessions to discuss progress, challenges, and next steps.

item.title: Application Review
item.description: After submitting your application, I'll review it within 3-5 business days.

item.title: Initial Call
item.description: If your application is a good fit, we'll schedule an initial call to discuss your goals and expectations.

item.title: Create a Plan
item.description: Together, we'll create a personalized learning plan based on your current skills and goals.

item.title: Regular Sessions
item.description: We'll meet regularly (frequency based on your commitment level) to work through challenges and track progress.

person.name: Tovia Amadi
person.biography: A dedicated digital marketing and design professional who blends creative visions with practical business insights.

item.review: Aghogho Meyoron is an incredible Fullstack developer whose talents never ceases to amaze me, from crafting seamless user experiences to building robust backend systems. He pours skills and passion into every line of code. Beyond his tech brilliance, he is sharp witted, supportive, dedicated, innovative, and consistently delivers high quality work.
Creative, resourceful, and a great team-player. He is good at what he does and always delivers in line with his words

By far, Mayor is one of the best people I've met in this tech space and he has pushed me to always do better, he never looks down on anyone, even when he's standing his grounds, he is passionate about his work and never hesitates to lend a helping hand. Mayor has built a niche of trust around himself, and his humbleness is the top of it all
Young Mayor is one of the surviving defenders of PHP on earth. He is a professional and he delivers a job well done

person.name: Boluwaji Akinsefunmi
person.biography: Your ever-whining-dev, mobile app developer at Lexus Technologies Ltd., Lagos

item.review: Agba Developer, PHP Lord, Back-end Beast, Heroku Specialist API Demystifier, All-Round Programmer... The titles he posses are just numerous, he is a problem solver that pays keen attention to little details that others might ignore!

person.name: Olaifa Boluwatife
person.biography: Software engineer focused on solving solutions.

item.review: Mayor is always passionate of whatever task or job he is working on
I have a great partnership with Mayor. He is a proficient developer and I can confidently recommend him to anyone who needs a dab hand

person.name: Igbokwe Laurence
person.biography: I am a prolific forger of impressive products, a creative Software engineer with more than 3 years experience in delivering result - oriented brands and creative solutions to meet business needs

item.review: Super smart, wonderful engineer and person

person.name: Mohammed Adekunle
person.biography: A software engineer with specialization in building and deploying server-side and system software. I work with PHP, Node(TS) and C/C++. I also work on web apps with Vue, Nuxt and Webpack.

item.review: He is a talented and reliable software engineer.I have worked on several projects with him and I can say he has proven more than competent to deliver excellent results all within reasonable time.

person.name: Chuba Samuel
person.biography: Nothing is free, but ALL is possible, IF God is on my side.

item.review: He is a young achiever and a source of lively inspiration to me everyday. An ardent fan of Laravel and anything PHP.

item.question: What's the best way to reach you?
item.answer: Feel free to use either the contact form above or send me a direct email. I typically respond within 24-48 hours.

item.question: Do you take on freelance projects?
item.answer: Yes, I'm open to freelance opportunities. Please provide details about your project in the contact form, and I'll get back to you with my availability.

item.question: Are you available for consulting?
item.answer: Absolutely! I offer consulting services for web development, architecture, and technical strategy. Reach out to discuss your needs.

item.question: How long does it take to hear back?
item.answer: I strive to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please mention it in your message.
